name: Reach Labs
headline: Long range, wireless energy distribution that scales
description: Reach Labs is building long-range wireless power networks that deliver scalable, resilient energy infrastructure.

# High-Performance, Scalable Wireless Power-at-a-Distance
[ Contact Us ](https://reachlabs.co/<https:/reachpower.com/contact/>)
Reach’s state-of-the-art hardware and machine learning algorithms deliver the world’s first Industrial-Scale wireless power solution – intelligent, long range, high power, and point-to-multipoint.

generated_description:
**Reach Labs: Powering the Future of Energy**

Reach Labs is at the forefront of revolutionizing energy distribution through long-range, wireless power networks. Founded in 2015 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S15, the company is headquartered in Emeryville, CA, and has a dedicated team of 16 employees bustling with innovation.

Their mission is clear: to create scalable and resilient energy infrastructure that can deliver power wirelessly over long distances. By leveraging state-of-the-art hardware and advanced machine learning algorithms, Reach Labs has developed the world’s first industrial-scale wireless power solution. This technology is not just a gadget; it promises to deliver intelligent, high-power energy in a point-to-multipoint manner. This could change everything about how we think about electricity, making it more accessible and sustainable.

With a focus on both commercial and governmental markets, Reach Labs is positioning itself to provide solutions that serve a wide array of needs. If you’re interested in their products, you can explore more about their offerings on their website, which includes insights into their commercial and government sectors, company values, and career opportunities.

They are backed by reputable partners and investors, including the US Navy and other key players in the energy sector, which adds credibility to their groundbreaking work.

Their values are not just corporate buzzwords; they are principles promoting innovation and sustainability, priorities in today’s climate-focused agenda. And if you’re looking to join a forward-thinking team, they are actively hiring, indicating robust growth potential.

Want to learn more? You can visit their website at [Reach Labs](https://reachlabs.co/) and dive into their plans to reshape the energy landscape.

**In summary**, Reach Labs is a beacon of innovation in the energy sector, combining cutting-edge technology with a sustainable vision. With their ambitious mission and strong team, they are well-positioned to make a significant impact.
